I can't reproduce this on rc4. I started on a fresh install and installed the 3 components mentionned previously all at once.
Do you restart eclipse after the installation of the component?
Can you reproduce this consistently? What are the steps?
I'm not able to reproduce this consistently. I've done a fresh install and reinstalled, working now. The old install is still broken and does not start up. Not sure- you may want to close as bogus?
